page.title: 07FARMING.
page.content: {Ashgrove House}is quite a large farm.The farmer makes his living with his apple orchards,dairy cows and beef cattle.He picks the apples and packs them in boxes to be taken to the shops to be sold.Damaged apples are taken to the Green Gate factories where they are made into {apple juice. {Beef}comes from beef cattle.The cattle eat the grass until they are fat enough to go to the slaughter house. The farmer makes silage in the month of of June or July so that when winter comes they don't have to go out in the fields. At the farm the cows are milked twice a day.Once in the morning and once in the evening.Butter,cheese,cream and yogurt can all be made from milk.
